text:
Computer systems analysts,
computer programmers, software engineers or other similarly skilled workers in
the computer field who qualify for exemption under 29 C.F.R. 541.400 would not
be “service employees” for purposes of the SCA. (See 29 U.S.C. 213(a)(1) and 13
(a)(17); FOH Chapter 22)
html: Computer systems analysts, computer programmers, software engineers or other similarly skilled workers in the computer field who qualify for exemption under 29 C.F.R. 541.400 would not be “service employees” for purposes of the SCA. (See 29 U.S.C. 213(a)(1) and 13 (a)(17); FOH Chapter 22)
